content: मंडन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मंडयति मंड-ल्यु ल्युट् वा] {@--1@} Adorning, decorating. {@--2@} Fond of ornaments. --नं {@--1@} The act of decorating or ornamenting, adorning; माम क्षमं मंडनकालहानेः <ls>R. 13. 16</ls>; मंडनविधिः <ls>Ś. 6. 5.</ls> {@--2@} An ornament, decoration, embellishment; सा मंडनान्मंडनमन्वभुंक्त <ls>Ku. 7. 5</ls>; <ls>Ki. 8. 40</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 71.</ls> --नः (or मंडननिश्रः) <ab>N.</ab> of a philosopher who is said to have been defeated in controversy by Śaṅkarācārya.
